DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize healthy sedentary people age 20-80 year 16 week supervise exercise versus exercise . Several end point evaluate 16 week include insulin sensitivity muscle physiology .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Exercise Intervention Various Physiologic Factors That Change With Increasing Age
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy subject perform < 30 min exercise twice per week study prior randomization sixteen week exercise . They randomize sixteen week supervise exercise perform stationary bike vs. placebo exercise ( series flexibility exercise perform home ) . Intensity , duration frequency exercise gradually increase four session per week last forty minute achieve 80 % target heart rate . Participants weigh perioidically counsel appropriately weight change > 2 % . Insulin sensitivity muscle mitochondrial protein synthesis study .
